html: Seriously after a long time I laughed a lot in a theatre. Such a superb film it was. Start to end comedy and interesting twists. @sonakshisinha @jimmysheirgill @jassi1gill and that Pakistani cop were the lifeline of the film. Sonakshi could pull the film on her shoulders.
